Name: convert_binx2xlum
Title: Convert Risø BIN/BINX to XLUM
Description: Wrapped function to quickly convert BIN/BINX files to  xlum  (files)
Author: Sebastian Kreutzer, Institute of Geography, Heidelberg University, Heidelberg (Germany)
Citation: Kreutzer, S., 2022. convert_binx2xlum(): Convert Risø BIN/BINX to XLUM. Function version 0.1.0. In: Kreutzer, S., 2022. xlum: Read, Write, and Convert XLUM Data. R package version 0.1.0.

Name: convert_Daybreak2xlum

Name: convert_psl2xlum
Title: Convert SUERC PSL-files to XLUM
Description: Wrapped function to quickly convert PSL files to  xlum  (files) from the portable luminescence system produced by the SUERC
Author: Sebastian Kreutzer, Institute of Geography, Heidelberg University, Heidelberg (Germany)
Citation: Kreutzer, S., 2022. convert_psl2xlum(): Convert SUERC PSL-files to XLUM. Function version 0.1.0. In: Kreutzer, S., 2022. xlum: Read, Write, and Convert XLUM Data. R package version 0.1.0.

Name: convert_rlum2xlum
Title: Convert RLum-class objects to the XLUM format
Description: Converts  Luminescence::RLum  objects to xlum format
Author: Sebastian Kreutzer, Institute of Geography, Heidelberg University, Heidelberg (Germany)
Citation: Kreutzer, S., 2022. convert_rlum2xlum(): Convert RLum-class objects to the XLUM format. Function version 0.1.0. In: Kreutzer, S., 2022. xlum: Read, Write, and Convert XLUM Data. R package version 0.1.0.

Name: convert_xsyg2xlum
Title: Convert Freiberg Instruments XSYG files to XLUM

Author: Sebastian Kreutzer, Institute of Geography, Heidelberg University, Heidelberg (Germany)

Name: read_xlum
Title: Import XLUM files
Description: Imports XLUM-files using  xml2::read_xml . Comes with a few convenience features, such as the transformation of string lists to numeric vectors where meaningful.
Author: Sebastian Kreutzer, Institute of Geography, Heidelberg University, Heidelberg (Germany)
Citation: Kreutzer, S., 2022. read_xlum(): Import XLUM files. Function version 0.1.0. In: Kreutzer, S., 2022. xlum: Read, Write, and Convert XLUM Data. R package version 0.1.0.

Name: validate_xlum
Title: Validate xlum format against an XSD reference schema
Description: A a convenience wrapper around  xml2::xml_validate  against the reference format description shipped with  xlum-package
Author: Sebastian Kreutzer, Geography & Earth Sciences, Aberystwyth University
Citation: Kreutzer, S., 2022. validate_xlum(): Validate xlum format against an XSD reference schema. In: Kreutzer, S., 2022. xlum: Read, Write, and Convert XLUM Data. R package version 0.1.0.

Name: write_xlum
